PropertyDef.Name: Name
PropertyDef.Description: Name of the character.

PropertyDef.Name: Avatar
PropertyDef.Description: A url to an image for this character in the game

PropertyDef.Name: Type
PropertyDef.Description: The type of character (Marshmallow, Ninja, NPC, etc.)

PropertyDef.Name: IsMissing
PropertyDef.Description: A flag indicating if this character is 'missing' - i.e. they have not been found yet.

PropertyDef.Name: IntroducedAtLevel
PropertyDef.Description: The number of the level which the character shows up.  For some games, all characters will be introduced right out of the gate.  This field is agnostic of the specific values   - and it can be left blank.

PropertyDef.Name: Description
PropertyDef.Description: Short description of the character for the game.

PropertyDef.Name: Game
PropertyDef.Description: The game associated with this character.

PropertyDef.Name: GameIsActive
PropertyDef.Description: A flag for whether the game associated with this character is active.

ObjectDef.Name: AppUser
ObjectDef.Description: A list of users allowed to access games.
